remarks: The restriction of a permutation fixing an element to the set with this element removed is an element of the restricted symmetric group. (Contributed by AV, 4-Jan-2019.)
statement:
symgfixf.p $e |- P = ( Base ` ( SymGrp ` N ) ) $.
symgfixf.q $e |- Q = { q e. P | ( q ` K ) = K } $.
symgfixf.s $e |- S = ( Base ` ( SymGrp ` ( N \ { K } ) ) ) $.
symgfixf.d $e |- D = ( N \ { K } ) $.
symgfixelsi $p |- ( ( K e. N /\ F e. Q ) -> ( F |` D ) e. S ) $.
$d K q $.
$d P q $.
